description: Michael Crawford performs a selection of Broadway, inspirational and traditional favorites at the Cerritos Center in Los Angeles. He is also joined by Dale Kristien, his Phantom Of The Opera co-star, for the songs from that show.
keywords: tv special,live performance,concert film,character name in title
name: Michael Crawford in Concert

review.name: Entrancing! Crawford Sings Like an "Angel of Music"
review.reviewBody: I saw this special when it was broadcast on PBS. All I have to say after seeing it is that Michael Crawford has one of the most entrancing tenor voices I have ever heard. Seeing the special really made me wish that I could have seen "Phantom of the Opera" on Broadway with him as the Phantom. His selections from that musical sounded heavenly. His other selections, especially the Irish music, were also beautiful. I only wish my local video store had this in stock so I could rent it sometime.
